document_data.caption: A map showing Balthorr's Rare & Wondrous Treasures (labeled #14) north of Buckle Alley.
document_data.name: Balthorr's Rare and Wondrous Treasures
document_data.mainbody: '''Balthorr's Rare & Wondrous Treasures''' was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The shop stood a single story tall.
document_data.Location: Balthorr's Rare & Wondrous Treasures was located in the southeast section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on the west side of the [[Street of the Sword]] just north of [[Buckle Alley]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Castle Ward}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned by its namesake, [[Balthorr Olaskos]].
document_data.Services: [[Magic item]]s and stolen property could be acquired within the shop.
